unsigned int  code = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Function to add an element to code.

Parameters:
cmd The string to add
code If 0, the code is created, otherwize it is the key in the map to add the string
Returns:
if param code = 0, the assigned code to add other element to the same item, otherwize return 0
